description: Gets a listing (a record of an asset at a given time). If you specify a listing version, only details that are specific to that version are returned.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the listing was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the listing.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the listing.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the listing.

nested_items.name: assetListing
nested_items.description: An asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: assetRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: assetType
nested_items.description: The type of an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog was created.

nested_items.name: forms
nested_items.description: The metadata forms attached to an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: glossaryTerms
nested_items.description: The glossary terms attached to an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The shoft description of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: latestTimeSeriesDataPointForms
nested_items.description: The latest time series data points forms included in the additional attributes of an asset.

nested_items.name: contentSummary
nested_items.description: The content of the summary of the time series data points form.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The name of the time series data points summary form.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the time series data points summary form.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the time series data points summary form.

nested_items.name: typeIdentifier
nested_items.description: The type ID of the time series data points summary form.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The type revision of the time series data points summary form.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the project where an asset published in an Amazon DataZone catalog exists.

nested_items.name: dataProductListing
nested_items.description: The data product listing.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the data product listing was created.

nested_items.name: dataProductId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: dataProductRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: forms
nested_items.description: The metadata forms of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: glossaryTerms
nested_items.description: The glossary terms of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The shoft description of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The data assets of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: glossaryTerms
nested_items.description: The glossary terms of the data product.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The shoft description of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: listingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: listingRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the owning project of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: listingRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of a listing.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the listing.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the listing.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the listing was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the listing.
